title-group.article-title: A VARIANT OF THE BOMBIERI-VINOGRADOV THEOREM WITH EXPLICIT CONSTANTS AND APPLICATIONS

abstract.p: We give an effective version with explicit constants of a mean value theorem of Vaughan related to the values of ùúì(y, œá), the twisted summatory function associated to the von Mangoldt function Œõ and a Dirichlet character œá. As a consequence of this result we an effective variant of the Bombieri-Vinogradov theorem with explicit constants. This effective variant has the potential to provide explicit results in many problems. We give examples of such results in several number theoretical problems related to shifted primes.
